coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.subtitle: Everything you need to build habits that last.

feature1.title: AI-Generated Quests
feature1.description: Daily and weekly challenges generated automatically. Personalized by user level, joined communities, and past progress. Clear, measurable tasks with XP rewards scaled by difficulty.

feature2.title: Gamification System
feature2.description: XP, levels, and progress milestones from Beginner to Advanced. Visible improvement without pressure, tracked per community.

feature3.title: Communities & Clans
feature3.description: Join interest-based communities or form clans for teamwork and accountability. Role-based access and shared XP growth.

feature4.title: Real-Time Chat & AI Chat
feature4.description: Community & clan chat in real-time. AI chat powered by tokens with conversation history saved and clearly visible balance.

feature5.title: Progress & Consistency
feature5.description: Daily streaks, quest history (today/yesterday/week), and time-zone aware scheduling. Built for long-term consistency.

integrationFeatures.title: Seamless Integrations
integrationFeatures.description: Connects with the tools you already use.

hero.title: LevelUp exists to make consistency feel achievable.

story.title: Built to solve burnout.
story.p1: We were tired of rigid productivity tools that made us feel guilty for missing a day. Motivation fades, but systems last.
story.p2: LevelUp calmly explains that progress should feel earned, not forced. We prioritize honest feedback loops over toxic productivity.

closing.title: "This is not about doing more. It’s about showing up—consistently."
